org.corfudb.runtime.view

Interface ICorfuDBInstance

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LocalCorfuDBInstance

    public interface ICorfuDBInstance
    This interface represents a CorfuDB instance. A CorfuDB instance contains the following: * A Configuration Master, used for configuring the instance. * A Sequencer, used for issuing tokens (which may be streaming or non streaming). * A WriteOnceAddressSpace, the persistent storage area for the log.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IWriteOnceAddressSpace getAddressSpace()
      Gets a write-once address space for this instance.
      IConfigurationMaster getConfigurationMaster()
      Gets a configuration master for this instance.
      ISequencer getSequencer()
      Gets a sequencer (regular) for this instance.
      IStreamingSequencer getStreamingSequencer()
      Gets a streaming sequencer for this instance.
      UUID getUUID()
      Gets a unique identifier for this instance.
      CorfuDBView getView()
      Gets the current view of this instance.
      IStream openStream(UUID id)
      Opens a stream given it's identifier using this instance, or creates it on this instance if one does not exist.

      • getView

        CorfuDBView getView()
        Gets the current view of this instance.
        Returns:

      • openStream

        IStream openStream(UUID id)
        Opens a stream given it's identifier using this instance, or creates it on this instance if one does not exist.
        Parameters:
        id - The unique ID of the stream to be opened.
        Returns:
        The stream, if it exists. Otherwise, a new stream is created using this instance.
